title: Bank of America drops surprising 2026 market forecast — here's what to expect and what investors must know
description: Bank of America 2026 forecast shocks Wall Street. The S&P 500 is expected at 7,100, just 4% above current levels. Buybacks are slowing, hitting $234.6 billion in Q2 2025, down 20% from Q1. Tech giants are spending $370 billion on AI and data centers, limiting…
content: Bank of America 2026 forecast is shaking up Wall Street. The bank predicts the S&P 500 will end 2026 at 7,100, just 4% above current levels. Thats far below the double-digit gains many investors … [+6218 chars]
